categories.Name: Beef
categories.Description: Beef is a source of high-quality protein and essential nutrients.

categories.Name: Chicken
categories.Description: Chicken stands between vegetables and other types of meat, as it provides a lot of protein packed with few calories.

categories.Name: Lamb
categories.Description: Lamb is an excellent source of protein and has a low content of fat and cholesterol.

categories.Name: Pork
categories.Description: Pork is the richest in protein, with beneficial effects on the skin, eyes, bones, nervous system, and mental performance.

categories.Name: Seafood
categories.Description: Seafood includes any form of sea life considered edible by humans.

categories.Name: Pasta
categories.Description: Pasta is a staple food in traditional Italian cuisine.

categories.Name: Vegetarian
categories.Description: Vegetarianism is the practice of abstaining from consuming meat. Veganism is the practice of refraining from using animal products.

categories.Name: Dessert
categories.Description: The term dessert can apply to many sweets, such as cookies, cakes, ice cream, pastries, pies, puddings, sweet soups, and tarts.
